TopicTitle: We need an Axiom Space mod now!!

Articles.Content:
It looks like Axiom Space is not kidding. So we really need a mod with the modules, maybe in the same shape as the HabTech2.

 

Spoiler

That last drawing looks way too low in the atmosphere.  It makes the space station look more like a high altitude blimp.

I agree that these parts would be nice in KSP. I can think of a few modders who would do a great job creating these parts but I think they are all busy with backlogs of other KSP work so I won't even mention them by name.
